channel.title: AI Chatbot on SmartWeb Support
channel.description: Recent content in AI Chatbot on SmartWeb Support

item.title: Can AI chatbots handle different products and services?
item.description:
AI Chatbot’s Diverse Service Support Capabilities link

Flexible Information Integration and Response Generation link

AI chatbots can flexibly handle different products and services.

They can retrieve information from multiple information sources, knowledge bases, websites, FAQs, and automatically generate responses tailored to each product and service.

Knowledge Management and System Optimization link

Common knowledge is centrally managed and shared learning across multiple services enables streamlined maintenance and cost reduction.

Customization and Operational Efficiency link

With easy customization capabilities, the system can handle multiple brands and diverse service content while optimizing overall system operations.

item.title: How is the handoff from AI chatbot to human operator performed?
item.description:
Escalation from AI Chatbot to Human Operator link

Automatic Escalation Conditions link

  • Complex question detection: When AI determines it cannot handle the inquiry
  • Negative emotion detection: Sensing customer dissatisfaction or frustration
  • Explicit human support requests: Direct requests like “I want to speak to a representative”
  • Response count limit: When the configured maximum number of responses is reached
  • Confidential information detection: Questions regarding personal information or contracts

Detailed Escalation Process link

Process Flow link

  • Situation assessment: AI agent automatically determines appropriate timing
  • Customer confirmation: “Would you like to be connected to a human operator?”
  • Immediate switch after approval: Instant transition to LiveAgent chat interface with button click

Handoff Features link

  • Conversation history transfer: Operators can review all previous conversation content
  • Automatic ticket creation: Automatically generates and manages tickets in LiveAgent

Human Assist Tool Features link

Chat Switching link

  • Real-time switching: Chat window seamlessly transfers to human operator
  • Context preservation: AI conversation content is completely handed over

Customer Support Optimization link

  • Priority settings: Priority handling for VIP customers and urgent cases
  • Customizable: Adjustable button text and display timing

item.title: Is 24/7 Support Really Possible?
item.description:
Feasibility of 24/7 Support link

24/7/365 Support with AI Chatbots link

SmartWeb’s AI chatbots operate continuously 24 hours a day, 365 days a year without interruption. Unlike traditional human customer support, they can provide fast and accurate responses regardless of time zones or holidays.

Benefits: Always-On Instant Response link

Immediate answers are available even during late nights and holidays, minimizing customer wait times. The main advantages include:

  • 24/7/365 inquiry availability
  • Instant responses for improved customer satisfaction
  • Efficient utilization of human resources
  • Freedom from geographical and time constraints

Continuous Learning and Information Updates link

AI chatbots automatically and regularly learn from websites and support portals, always providing responses with the latest information. Through machine learning algorithms, the following evolution is possible:

item.title: Is it possible to customize AI chatbots?
item.description:
AI Chatbot Customization Overview link

Yes, various customizations are possible.

Customizable Features link

Basic Customization Options link

  • Appearance: Chat window colors, design, and logo
  • Response Style: Formality level, response length, and tone
  • Training Data: FAQ, manuals, and website content

Advanced Customization Options link

  • API Integration: Connection with inventory systems and booking systems
  • Custom Flows: Business workflows such as reservation handling and quote requests
  • Multi-language Support: Automatic responses in over 100 languages

Customization Implementation Process link

Customization Steps link

  1. Requirements gathering and analysis
  2. Customization proposal and quotation
  3. Implementation and testing
  4. Production deployment

Please contact us for more details.

item.title: Is multi-language support available?
item.description:
Overview of Multi-language Support link

Supported Languages link

SmartWeb’s AI chatbot flexibly supports multiple languages, including Japanese and English. To meet the needs of corporate global expansion and diverse customer requirements, simultaneous support for up to 15 languages is possible. Specific supported languages include:

  • Japanese
  • English
  • Chinese (Simplified & Traditional)
  • Korean
  • Spanish
  • French
  • German

Translation Features link

SmartWeb’s advanced translation functionality allows questioners to interact with the chatbot comfortably in their native language. The AI instantly translates learning data and delivers natural responses that preserve nuance. This enables smooth customer support that transcends language barriers.

item.title: Please explain the process from AI chatbot implementation to operational launch
item.description:
Overall AI Chatbot Implementation Process link

SmartWeb’s AI chatbot implementation proceeds with a phased approach and comprehensive support system:

The content includes tasks for our company and the client.

Phase 1: Preparation & Design (1 week) link

Requirements Definition and Project Planning link

  • Requirements Definition Interview: Clarification of business objectives and coverage scope - Web meeting (our company & client)
  • Knowledge Survey: Inventory of existing documents and FAQs (client)
  • Scope Setting: Determination of question categories the chatbot will handle (client)

Operations Design link

  • Escalation Conditions: Design of handover timing to humans (client)
  • Operations Structure Planning: Confirmation of responsible parties and operational flows (client)

Phase 2: Construction & Configuration (1-2 weeks) link

System Environment Construction link

  • FlowHunt Environment Construction: Workspace creation and API configuration (our company)
  • LiveAgent Integration Setup: Implementation of seamless escalation functionality (our company)

Knowledge Base Development link

  • Knowledge Base Construction:
    • Website crawling setup (our company)
    • Document upload and classification (our company)
    • Q&A list creation and registration (client)

AI Agent Adjustment link

  • System Configuration:
    • System message configuration (our company)
    • Response tone and style adjustment (our company)
    • Tool selection and integration setup (our company)

Design Adjustment link

  • Design Customization: Appearance adjustment to match brand image (our company)

Phase 3: Testing & Tuning (1 week) link

Functionality Testing link

  • Basic Function Verification:
    • Basic response and escalation operation confirmation (client)
    • Accuracy adjustment and response quality improvement (our company & client)

Performance Evaluation link

  • Technical Verification:
    • Load testing and response time measurement (client)
    • Usability testing (verification in actual usage scenarios) (client)

Final Adjustment link

  • Final Configuration: Feedback reflection and configuration optimization (our company)

Phase 4: Production Launch & Support link

Phased Rollout link

  • Publication Process: Deployment from limited users to full rollout (client)

Continuous Monitoring link

  • Operations Monitoring:
    • Continuous monitoring of performance and satisfaction (client)
    • Initial operations period support provision (our company)

Improvement Cycle link

  • Regular Reviews:
    • Effectiveness measurement and improvement point identification (our company & client)
    • Knowledge addition and feature enhancement planning and execution (our company & client)

For post-implementation processes and improvement methods, please refer to “AI Chatbot Post-Implementation Processes and Improvement Methods.”

item.title: Tell me about multilingual support and 24/7 operation of AI chatbots
item.description:
Multilingual Support and 24/7 Operation of AI Chatbots link

Multilingual Support Features link

Automatic Language Detection and Extensive Support link

  • Automatic Language Detection: Automatically identifies user language
  • 100+ Language Support: Natural conversations in major world languages
  • Language-Specific Knowledge Base: Content management optimized for each language
  • Cultural Considerations: Response style adjustments that consider regional characteristics
  • Real-Time Translation: Instant language switching when needed

24/7/365 Operation System link

Technology Enabling Continuous Operation link

  • Non-Stop Operation: Stable 24/7 operation through cloud infrastructure
  • Time Zone Support: Response adjustments according to business hours in different regions worldwide
  • Load Balancing: Scalability capable of handling large simultaneous access
  • Automatic Updates: System updates executed without downtime
  • Disaster Recovery: Redundant configuration across multiple data centers

Business Benefits of Operation link

Global Support and Efficiency link

  • Preventing Lost Opportunities: Immediate response to inquiries outside business hours
  • Global Expansion: Service provision to customers worldwide regardless of time differences
  • Cost Efficiency: Significant reduction in 24-hour human support costs
  • Consistent Quality: Uniform response quality regardless of time or personnel
  • Scalability: Automatic response to increasing inquiries

item.title: What AI Engine Do You Use?
item.description:
Overview of AI Engines link

Available Large Language Models (LLMs) link

We can utilize advanced large language models (LLMs) such as Anthropic’s “Claude Opus 4” and “Claude Sonnet 4”, OpenAI’s “ChatGPT 5” and “ChatGPT 4.1”, and Google’s “Gemini 2.5”, providing high text comprehension and generation capabilities in multiple languages including Japanese. LLMs can be used according to specific purposes and cost requirements.

What is an LLM? link

Definition of Large Language Models link

LLM (Large Language Model) refers to AI technology that can understand and create natural text like humans do.

item.title: What are FlowHunt's AI Agents and what features do they have?
item.description:
Overview of FlowHunt’s AI Agents link

FlowHunt’s AI Agents are advanced AI systems that can autonomously process information and execute complex tasks using multiple tools.

Key Features of AI Agents link

  • Autonomy: Capable of making independent decisions without human intervention
  • Learning Ability: Learn from experience and data to improve performance
  • Adaptability: Adjust strategies in response to new information or environmental changes
  • Interaction: Naturally collaborate with humans and other systems

Available Tools link

Information Search Tools link

  • Arxiv Tool: Search for the latest research information from academic paper databases
  • PubMed Tool: Access medical and life science literature databases
  • Wikipedia Tool: Provide comprehensive general knowledge and background information

Media Search Tools link

  • YouTube Search: Search and present related videos as references
  • Reddit Tool: Collect community insights and trend information

Web Search Tools link

  • Google Search Retriever: Execute real-time web searches
  • Document Retriever: Extract information from uploaded documents
  • URL Retriever: Extract and verify information from web pages

Agent Execution Example link

When a customer asks about “connection issues with new product XYZ-4000”:

item.title: What are the post-implementation processes and improvement methods for AI chatbots?
item.description:
Post-Implementation Processes for AI Chatbots link

Overall Implementation Strategy link

We recommend a quality-focused, phased post-implementation process.

Phase 1 (Immediately After Implementation) - Quality Assurance link

Data Preparation and Organization link

  • Organize existing FAQs and manuals with attention to readability
  • Thoroughly check information for accuracy and currency
  • Verify comprehensive coverage of common question patterns

Initial Implementation Operations link

  • Learn using URL Retriever or Document Retriever
  • Escalate unanswerable questions to human operators
  • Record questions that AI cannot handle (conversations with AI chatbots are recorded as LiveAgent tickets)

Phase 2 (1-2 months later) - Improving Data Quality link

Inquiry Analysis link

  • Analyze actual inquiry content
  • Identify frequent questions and add them to FAQs

Content Improvement link

  • Identify and improve ambiguous expressions and insufficient information
  • Evaluate content using readability tools and simplify, shorten, and restructure text
  • Update to accurate, business-appropriate information
  • Expand FAQ and knowledge base

Phase 3 (3 months and beyond) - Continuous Quality Management link

Regular Updates link

  • Set up regular crawling schedules using scheduling features
  • Continuous content expansion
  • Test readability and re-evaluate improvement levels

Quality Maintenance link

  • Regular accuracy checks of information
  • Addition of new inquiry patterns
  • AI response accuracy improves, significantly enhancing self-service resolution rates

Expected Implementation Benefits link

  • First Contact Resolution (FCR) improves by up to 28%
  • Response time reduced by up to 73%
  • Customer Satisfaction (CSAT) improves by 10 points
  • Inquiry handling volume reduced by up to 52%

Quality Management Key Points link

  • Recognize that poor data quality is the biggest challenge in AI implementation
  • Focus on improving “quality” rather than increasing “quantity”
  • Understand that insufficient information and ambiguous expressions directly impact response accuracy
  • Establish processes for regular review and updates

item.title: What Content Volume and Quality Are Required for AI Chatbot Implementation?
item.description:
Content Strategy for AI Chatbot Implementation link

In AI chatbot implementation, content ‘quality’ is more important than ‘quantity’. Poor data quality is often cited as a major challenge when implementing AI.

Key Points for Content Quality link

Accurate and Up-to-date Information link

  • Outdated or incorrect content directly affects AI response accuracy
  • Regular updates and verification of information accuracy are essential

Content Appropriate for Business and Purpose link

  • Customer service: Comprehensive coverage of frequently asked questions and user inquiry patterns
  • FAQ automation: Content reflecting actual customer needs
  • Technical support: Troubleshooting procedures and product specifications

Content Structure and Readability link

  • Use simple language (avoid technical terms or provide explanations)
  • Concise sentences (aim for 15-20 words per sentence)
  • Write in active voice (“The team submitted the report”)
  • Structure with headings, bullet points, and short paragraphs
  • Aim for middle school level readability

Quantitative Aspects of Content link

While specific numerical standards cannot be clearly defined, the following content can be considered sufficient implementation conditions:

item.title: What is the accuracy of AI chatbot responses?
item.description:
Current State of AI Chatbot Response Accuracy link

Accuracy Improvement Through Knowledge Learning link

By training with appropriate knowledge, responses nearly as good as humans can be achieved. SmartWeb’s AI chatbots combine vast databases with machine learning technology to enable more natural and accurate conversations. They particularly feature the following characteristics:

  • Continuous learning functionality that constantly improves response quality
  • Understanding of context and generation of contextually appropriate responses
  • Acquisition of new knowledge from user interactions

Accuracy of Responses in Specialized Fields link

Even specialized questions can be answered accurately by training with relevant materials. SmartWeb’s AI chatbots can build knowledge bases specialized for specific industries or fields, making them capable of handling highly specialized questions. For example:

item.title: What Preparation is Required to Build an AI Chatbot?
item.description:
Preparation for AI Chatbot Development link

Building SmartWeb’s AI chatbot primarily requires “knowledge base preparation” and “establishing operational systems.”

Three Methods for Knowledge Base Construction link

The information source (knowledge base) for AI chatbot responses can be built through the following three methods:

1. Website Crawling link

Regularly crawl your company’s website to automatically gather the latest information.

  • Full domain crawling
  • Specific page designation
  • Sitemap-based crawling
  • Periodic automatic update settings

2. Q&A List Registration link

Manually register and manage frequently asked questions and answers.

item.title: What should I do if AI gives incorrect answers?
item.description:
Basic Strategies for Addressing Incorrect AI Responses link

Correcting and Updating the Knowledge Base link

You can improve it by correcting and updating the underlying knowledge content. If you modify web pages, the system will automatically re-learn during the next crawl. Specifically, by replacing incorrect information or inappropriate expressions with accurate information, you can continuously improve the AI’s response accuracy. An accurate knowledge base is a crucial element that enhances the reliability and usefulness of AI assistants.

item.title: What types of companies are AI chatbot plans suitable for?
item.description:
Features of AI Chatbot Plans and Companies Suitable for Implementation link

24/7 Automated Support System link

AI chatbot plans are like excellent staff members that automatically respond to customers’ frequently asked questions and work 24/7 without breaks. They are particularly ideal for companies that need to handle inquiries outside business hours and on holidays.

Flexible Implementation and Multilingual Support link

They can accommodate a wide range of companies from small to large enterprises and are suitable for businesses that want to establish a comprehensive customer support system at low cost. With escalation functionality that smoothly transfers complex questions to human staff, you can implement the system with confidence. The multilingual support feature (approximately 100 languages) including English, Chinese, and Spanish makes them ideal for companies expanding their global business.

item.title: What's the Difference from ChatGPT API?
item.description:
Comparison Between FlowHunt and ChatGPT API link

Purpose and Features link

FlowHunt specializes in business use and can limit response scope to company data. ChatGPT API is general-purpose but requires all custom implementation. When leveraging corporate knowledge bases or proprietary data, the approaches of both solutions differ significantly.

FlowHunt’s Advantages link

Customizability link

  • Responses specialized for corporate data
  • Design optimized for business environments

FlowHunt provides highly customized responses based on corporate internal data and specific knowledge bases. It leverages internal documents, manuals, past project information, and other learning data to realize AI assistants optimized for organizations.
